# PED::SET_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE_HOLD_LAST_FRAME

## Summary
Set the hold last frame state of a synchronized scene

## Parameters
* **INT** sceneID: The scene index returned by CREATE_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE loop - true to hold the scene at the last frame, false otherwise
* **BOOL** holdLastFrame

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Use this command to set the hold last frame state of a synchronised scene after it has been created.
